<S%G1161><s%> Some <S%G243><s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> stony <S%G4075>places,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> earth: <S%G1093><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>forthwith<s%> they sprung <S%G1816>up,<s%> because they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G899>deepness<s%> of earth: <S%G1093><s%>

Who <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>
